name: Silverado: Trigger, Target, Shoot!
description:
Silverado TTS is a shooter game inspired by the movie "Silverado". We made it for a college project. They gave us about 4 months to develop it.

In the movie, Paden, one of the main characters, kills Cobb, the last sheriff of the town and became the new one. Our game starts from here, with Paden operating like the sheriff.

One gang had a corrupt relationship with Cobb before he died, this made Big Mike - the gang's leader - angry, so he planned to hijack Paden and take the Silverado town.
